mobs.LongDesc: A forest ranger is here, checking on all visitors to the forest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The ranger is a big man and he looks tough to hurt.  He wears a
clean blue uniform with a ranger's hat.  His tall, black boots
give him an appearance that he's a strict man, one who follows
order and is intolerant to rule-breakers.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, brown bear is here looking for some wild berries.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
There's nothing special about this bear.  All throughout the
forest, these brown bears roam around here searching for food.  It
doesn't look hostile nor does it look like a ferocious meat-
eater.  This bear weighs about a ton and when it's threatened it
will fight back.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a white-tail deer here, prancing around the forest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This deer looks tall and strong. It has long, powerful horns that look quite
threatening.  The young deer is here just wandering in the forest, as though
nothing could harm it.

mobs.LongDesc: A wild boar is here charging through the forest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The boars in this forest look like they're rabid or something.
They just love charging through the forest even when there's no
sign of danger anywhere.  It would be advisable for you not to
get in their way.  This boar has two strong tusks and it probably
weighs more than 200 pounds.

mobs.LongDesc: An alligator is coming closer and closer to you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Messing with an alligator is dangerous for your health!  This
reptile has a set of teeth that can scar steel.  Its body is
massive and in this swamp it's the king of all predators.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a large anaconda here dangling on a tree branch.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The anaconda is one of the most dangerous snakes in the world.
Its coil could wrap you up and escape from them is almost 
always impossible.  This anaconda weighs about a hundred pounds
and it could be as long as 25 feet.

mobs.LongDesc: A hungry jaguar is here looking for something to kill.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Never mess with a big cat that's very hungry.  This jaguar has
powerful claws and its slash can rip through flesh like butter.
The jaguar is a beautiful animal with one of the most prized
animal pelts in the world.

mobs.LongDesc: An ugly gorilla is here sleeping on a soft bed of leaves.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This gorilla is very BIG.  Its powerful hands could easily 
uproot small trees...its fist can make dents on steel plates.
When a gorilla is mad or frighten, its strength can increase by
three folds and he would go berserk and kill anything that 
threatens it.

mobs.LongDesc: A tree-climbing possum is here looking for some beetles.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Did you know that a possum is the only non-primates with an
opposable thumb?  Just wanted to share something I learned from
watching public service television.  This small North-American
marsupial is here looking for fresh beetles which is one of their
main diets.  The possum would eat almost anything that it comes
across.

mobs.LongDesc: A ferocious tiger is looking forward to having some venison for supper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This predator is indeed ferocious!  Being one of the biggest of 
the big cats in this world, this striped beast could easily be
called the king of the jungle.  With its powerful sharp claws and
its threatening long teeth, the tiger is the most feared predator
in any jungle or forest.

mobs.LongDesc: An enormous, grey elephant is here feasting on some shrubbery.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
With its long, majestic tusks this great beast is considered by
many to be the most beautiful animal on Earth.  The elephant is
probably the most feared animal in the jungle...not even the big
cats would dare come close to attacking these big-eared mammals.

mobs.LongDesc: A red woodpecker is here pecking on a petrified tree.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Not exactly being the smartest bird in the animal kingdom, the
woodpecker is close to extinction.  Though it's one of the most
prettiest of birds, the woodpecker has a brain smaller that a pea!

mobs.LongDesc: There's a colorful lizard here crawling on the ground.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This lizard is quite a colorful critter.  It has a horned nose
and its eyes are large and round.  It moves almost faster than
the eye can see.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, hairy spider is here looking for some insects.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It's big and it's hairy.  This spider is also quite venomous and
it can paralyze its victim before they escape this eight-legged
predator.  This spider is hungry for big, juicy insects.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a big rhinoceros here eating some plants.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This horned beast could scare even the greatest predator away.
WIth its powerful horn, which could pierce steel plates, this
rhinoceros has no natural enemies.  Its body is also tougher than
sun-dried leather and its head is shielded with strong boney plates.

mobs.LongDesc: A funny-looking chimpanzee is here eating a big banana.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This chimpanzee looks quite happy with his life.  He looks like
he's having fun just eating a plain banana.  The chimp is playing
with his food at the same time he's eating it.

mobs.LongDesc: A grey wolf is running around the forest, looking for his pack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This wild animal is always dangerous anywhere and when it's with
a pack, he could become fearless and kill preys as big as a
buffalo.  This wolf has sharp flesh-piercing teeth and it can
tear open throats with the simplest of ease.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a green caterpillar crawling on the forest grounds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This caterpillar looks plump and juicy, it would make a fine treat
for any bird or any other predators in the wild.  The caterpillar
is here crawling on the ground, searching for some green plants
to nibble on.

mobs.LongDesc: A monarch butterfly is here fluttering its large wings.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The monarch butterfly is the largest butterfly in the world.
With a wing span that could spread a good twelve inches it would
make a great meal for any hungry predator.  The entire forest is 
inhabited by many of these grand butterflies, they are of great
importance to the food chain.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a round beetle here running across the forest grounds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This large beetle looks frighten of anything that comes close to
it.  This bug is a great specimen for any bug collector.  Its rich,
dark color and those strange orange spots on its body are just
magnificent.

mobs.LongDesc: A three-toed sloth is slowly, slowly climbing up a tree.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The sloth is probably the slowest moving mammal on Earth.  It
takes its time as it tries to climb up a tree.  Though the furry
creature seems lazy, it's slow because of its unique bone 
structure.

mobs.LongDesc: An armadillo is searching for a meal of small bugs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
With its hard body covering, the armadillo is an obstacle for any
hungry predator.  Not many great beasts could rip through the
armadillo's stronghold, even the fierce badger would have a tough
time trying to cut through the armadillo's defense.

mobs.LongDesc: A grey rabbit is hopping up and down and all around.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This grey hare is probably the food of choice for all medium-
sized predators.  It's not the fastest moving animal and also not
the brightest, thus this rabbit tends to become the main diet of
wolves, bobcats, owls, and many other animals.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a poisonous frog here, croaking on a log.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Don't touch this frog...it looks poisonous.  From the exotic
color and the size of this frog, anyone can tell this frog looks
dangerous.  The aborigines of Brazil used these frogs to make
poison arrows.

mobs.LongDesc: A slimy little snail is moving slowly across the ground.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The tiny snail is here looking for some plant leaves to chew on.  
This little shelled bug is one of nature's most destructive
insect because of their appetite for fresh green leaves.  The
snail has a slimy body and a protective shell.

mobs.LongDesc: a rainbow-colored parrot is here eating a wild fruit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The parrot is one of the forest's most beautiful birds because
they come in a variety of magnificent colors.  The parrot is a
friendly bird but it's unfortunate that many people use traps to
catch these lovely birds and sell them.  Many of the rare parrots
today are very close to extinction and there's not much anyone
can do about it.

mobs.LongDesc: The elusive Bigfoot is here looking to get his photo taken.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This strange primate is here wandering through the forest.  You
are fascinated by this great beast as he passes you by.  He looks
very shy and is about to run away.  The Bigfoot is a huge 
creature.  He stands about eight feet tall and his knuckles are
almost to the floor.  This freak-of-nature has the strength of
ten men and can kill when it becomes frighten for any reason.

mobs.LongDesc: Hunter Bob is here carefully cleaning his Winchester.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hunter Bob looks like a fierce hunter.  He's a big man with a big
gun and this hunter is no push-over when it comes to a good
fight.  Hunter Bob has conquered the jungles of Africa, South
America, Austrailia, and now he's trying to hunt all the animals
in the Newbie Forest.  He's a merciless hunter and he makes sure
that the animal he kills will have a place in his trophy case!

mobs.LongDesc: Painter Smurf is here looking for his ideal model for his painting.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Painter is the best artist in the Smurf village.  His brush-
strokes are absolutely the best in the world.  Painter has a thin
moustache and he speaks with a strange French accent.  He wears a
painter's cap and always carry with him , his lucky paintbrush.

mobs.LongDesc: Farmer Smurf is working hard to gather all the crops for winter.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Farmer is the most prolific Smurf in the village.  His crops have
saved many Smurfs from starvation in the winter.  Every year, 
Farmer was given the trust of all the Smurfs to plant and
fertilize the crops for next year's harvest.

mobs.LongDesc: Greedy Smurf is keeping all of the Smurfberries for himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Greedy Smurf is not as greedy as most think he is.  He doesn't
always do things for himself.  Sometimes he would help others in
need like the time when Gargamel destroyed the Smurf's winter
food reserves, it was Greedy who was willing to share his goods
and thus saving the entire village from starvation.

mobs.LongDesc: Grouchy Smurf doesn't feel like being happy today.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Smurf may be the only Smurf in town who is rarely if ever
happy.  Unlike the others, Grouchy Smurf is simply happy by not
being happy...er, in expression sense, Grouchy may look unhappy
but really, he's seriously happy.

mobs.LongDesc: Baby Smurf is here crying for Smurfette's attention.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This strange little Smurf is the cutest of all Smurfs in the
village.  Everyone just loves Baby Smurf because he's just 
irresistable.  The little critter is also a powerful mutant
magician.  His special powers have saved the Smurfs countless
times during encounters with Gargamel and other evil baddies.

mobs.LongDesc: Vanity Smurf is here modeling front of his mirror.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Is there anyone who could be more vainglorious than Vanity Smurf
himself?  Vanity sits in front of a mirror all day long and
admires himself just because he looks better than the rest of the
Smurfs.  He may be conceited sometimes but this little Smurf is
also sensitive and kind...when he wants to be.

mobs.LongDesc: Handy Smurf is pointing a wooden, handcrafted gadget at your face!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Handy Smurf is the best carpenter and inventor in town.  No other
can match him in the skill of building and inventing new gadgets.
Handy Smurf wears a white overall with a pencil on his ear.
Because of his intelligence, Handy Smurf is admired by Smurfette so
much that even Hefty Smurf can't do a thing about it.

mobs.LongDesc: Hefty Smurf tells you, 'Wanna wrestle, you big ogre?'
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hefty Smurf is the strongest Smurf in the village.  He could beat 
three or four other Smurfs in a tug-o-war.  Hefty wears a heart
tattoo on his right arm and he's constantly flexing his muscles.
He's one of Smurfette's main suitors and he's always competing
with Handy Smurf for her attention.

mobs.LongDesc: Brainy Smurf is picking up all those useless books on the floor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Who's this little Steve Erckel look-alike?  Why he's Brainy
Smurf, the self-proclaimed Papa Smurf's advisor.  Brainy Smurf
is not as smart as you think he is.  Though he wears those thick
spectacles, Brainy is no smarter than the rest of the other 
Smurfs.  Brainy has a knack for always getting into trouble
because he thinks himself as being wise and thoughtful like
Papa Smurf.  He loves to command other Smurfs to do things because
he believes he's second-in-command when Papa Smurf is absent.

mobs.LongDesc: Smurfette is trying to cook a Smurfberry pie for Papa Smurf.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Smurfette is the prettiest Smurf in the world.  Of course, she is
also the only adult female Smurf in town.  Smurfette has the most
gorgeous blonde hair and her nice, white dress really reflects 
her beauty.  She's also an excellent cook and right now she's 
baking a homemade Smurfberry pie for the beloved Papa Smurf.

mobs.LongDesc: Papa Smurf is experimenting with some very powerful potions.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Papa Smurf is the wisest of all Smurfs.  Not only is he the
leader of the village, he's also a teacher to all.  Papa Smurf
teaches his little Smurfs the lessons in life and how to better
oneself.  His wise decisions and thoughtful ideas have saved the
Smurfs from danger many, many times.  Papa Smurf wears some red
spandex pants and a red cap.  He also has a nicely trimmed white
beard.

mobs.LongDesc: Poet Smurf is reciting a poem for all the Smurfs to hear.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Poet Smurf is the absolute master of all poets across the land.
The way he uses his words in his poetry could grab the attention
of all his audiences.  This little Smurf also talks in rhymes, and
enjoys daily recitation in the village square.

mobs.LongDesc: Clumsy Smurf is bumping into things and knocking them to the ground.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Clumsy Smurf is the clumsiest Smurf in the entire village.  He'll
trip and fall everywhere he goes.  Not only is Clumsy Smurf
clumsy, he also looks clumsy.  He's wearing spandex pants that
seems like it's falling down and his cap is drooping forward as
though it's about to fall off.  Clumsy is the best friend of
Brainy Smurf, and he admires Brainy so much that he'll do anything
for his nerd buddy.

mobs.LongDesc: Jokey Smurf wants you to open his present right now...hee hee.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jokey is the prankster in the village.  There's no one in the
village who has ever escape one of Jokey's most commonly-used
trick, the exploding gift box.  Though Jokey's pranks are
harmless, he gets into serious trouble when he goes a bit too
far.

mobs.LongDesc: Gargamel is catching Smurfs to make some Smurf-soup for supper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This evil fiend is named Gargamel and he's always trying to find
a way to catch the Smurfs.  Gargamel has failed many times trying
to catch the Smurfs but it seems today is his lucky day.  This
evil sorcerer wears a long black robe with grey patches everywhere.
He's a balding, old man with a face that resembles a bulldog.
Gargamel towers over the little Smurfs and he's crushing and 
stomping the mushroom houses.

mobs.LongDesc: A mangy, alley cat named Azrael is here pouncing on some Smurfs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This plain-looking alley cat is Gargamel's only friend in the
world.  Azrael is always craving for some Smurf stew and though
he has come close to getting his wish, there's always something
that goes wrong.  Together with Gargamel, these two have caused
many problems for the Smurfs and they'll keep making problems
until their diabolical plans actually work.

mobs.LongDesc: A lost Smurf is trying to find his way back to the Smurf Village.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This poor little Smurf is lost and can't find his way back home.
The small Smurf Village must be somewhere in this forest but
where?  The lost Smurf is moving back and forth trying to figure
out where is his original trail from the village.

mobs.LongDesc: A little, blue Smurf is frightened by your presence.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
There's nothing special about this Smurf.  He's a blue-skin troll
no bigger than a GI Joe action figure.  This Smurf is wearing a
pair of white spandex pants and a white cap.  He looks too small
to hurt anyone.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, pink salmon is here trying to make it upstream.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This salmon looks like it's ready to spawn.  It struggles to make it
upstream so it can lay its eggs.  The pink salmon is the grizzly's
main diet and it's also food to many birds as well.

mobs.LongDesc: Jungle Smurf is here swinging on vines and playing with the animals.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Unlike the other Smurfs, Jungle Smurf was brought up in the wild.  
Raised by animals, this Smurf learned to adapt to a harsh enviroment.
Though he reunited with his fellow Smurfs, Jungle Smurf could not
adjust to their simple lifestyle.  He chose to stay here in the wild,
so that he may protect his animals friends from hunters and poachers.

mobs.LongDesc: A camper is here, trying to find his way around the forest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's an ordinary camper who's trying to find some rest and
relaxation here in the wild.  He seems to be lost and can't find 
his way back...but lucky for him, he always carry a map wherever
he goes.  With this map, no one could ever get lost here.
